amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a pilot program to demonstrate effective tools and techniques for safeguarding natural resources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-378 to establish a pilot program to demonstrate effective tools and techniques for safeguarding natural resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 184 (Roll no. 596).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
